dmca.title: [EV1-C1923051T] Complaint
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=copyright.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----

helo=bay0-omc3-s23.bay0.hotmail.com; 

MIME element (text/plain)
Hello, 
 
Servermatrix.com appears to host poetsandwriters.net. The latter is a
copy of a website I bought last month called PoetryMag.com. 
 
I can prove that this is a copy if you view my site's history at
http://web.archive.org/web/20060113044500/poetrymag.com/index.shtml also
you can check various previous dates dating back to 2004 via
http://web.archive.org/web/*/http://poetrymag.com. 
 
You can also view
http://poetsandwriters.net/contact.shtml?keywords=Contact%20Poets%20and%
20Writers
where the e-mail address points to my website PoetryMag.com. 
 
Please note that PoetryMag.com has a new design since I purchased it and
also runs on a new script. 
 
The owner of poetsandwriters.net is the individual I purchased the
website from and is now selling the site illegally. He does not have my
permission or have the consent of those who submitted the poetry to do
this. 
 
Thanks in advance. 
 
Regards, 
 
  Steven
